dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: This is your main dashboard. Your AI trading bots and market overview will be displayed here.

login.title: Welcome to AuraQuant
login.subtitle: Sign in to access your trading dashboard.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

tour.step1: This is your main navigation sidebar. Access all key areas of the platform from here.
tour.step2: Here you'll find quick actions like search, notifications, and language or theme settings.
tour.step3: Your main workspace is here. All content, charts, and tools will be displayed in this area.
tour.step4: Click here to jump into the heart of AuraQuant: the AI-powered smart trading interface.

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.description: View, edit, and manage all users on the AuraQuant platform. Be advised that actions taken here are critical and can impact user access.
